snippet.title: Spring Tales | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Spring Tales is a cozy 2D puzzle adventure game. 

▪ Help the charming residents of Blossomdale prepare for their spring festival by solving puzzles, overcoming challenges, and rebuilding after a storm. 

▪ Experience a heartwarming story filled with friendship, hope, and community spirit.

▶ Wishlist on Steam; https://store.steampowered.com/app/3194840/Spring_Tales/
